page.title: 12TRANSPORT-M25
page.content: hen the Dartford Tunnel (now part of the M25 London Orbital Motorway) was opened it started a great change in the amount of traffic passing through Eynsford. The people of the village have been very upset because the heavy traffic has brought a great deal of noise, pollution and danger into their lives. Eynsford has many old ancient buildings which are gradually being spoilt. In 1979 a traffic count showed that nearly 10,000 vehicles which included 800 heavy lorries had used the high street. Now they are working on the Swanley/Sevenoaks section of the London Orbital Motorway and when it is finished we all hope Eynsford village will be free of all the heavy lorries and trucks.
